text: hananim-eun maliaui adeul ye sulo hayeogeum geu ijeon-e gyesidoen gu yag-eul hwagjunghamyeonseo geudeul-ui baljachwi leul ttaleudolog haessnola ttohan hananim eun sin-yag-eul gyesihayeo geu ijeon-e gye sidoen guyag-eul hwagjeunghamyeonseo geu an-e bog-eumgwa gwangmyeong-ol jueoss-euni ineun bog eum-iyo jeong-uie saneun jadeul-ui gyohun ila
